Let the messengers of truth pass on to another field. Here there may be a more favorable class of people, and may successfully accomplish the 


                                   -143- 

work of sowing and reaping. The report of their success will find its way to the place where God's work was apparently unsuccessful, and the next messenger of truth who goes there will be more favorably received. The seed sown in trial and discouragement will be seen to have life and vitality. First will appear the blade, then the ear, then the full corn in the ear.
